code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input        sel,         // Selection signal, 1-bit
    input  [7:0] a,           // 8-bit input vector
    input  [7:0] b,           // 8-bit input vector
    output logic [7:0] out    // 8-bit output vector
);

    always @(*) begin
        out = sel ? b : a;  // Corrected operation for 8-bit mux
    end

endmodule
```
[DONE]
